Title: Provides that applicants or recipients for food stamps shall not be subjected to finger imaging as a requirement of the food stamp program
Summary: Provides that applicants for or recipients of food stamps shall not be subjected to finger imaging as a requirement of the food stamp program.
LawCode: Amd ยง95, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to finger imaging for food stamps recipients
